original_text: When you go to fight a battle against your enemies, the Lord your God will give you power over them. You will take some of them as prisoners.
korean_text: 네가 나가서 적군과 싸울 때에 네 하나님 여호와께서 그들을 네 손에 넘기시므로 네가 그들을 사로잡은 후에

sentences.original_text: When you go to fight a battle
the Lord your God will give you power
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 승리를 주시고

sentences.original_text: You will take some of them
